articles.description: A mum has spoken out after she was mocked for her twins' names but others believe she shouldn’t look back in anger.
articles.content:
A UK mum claims shes been ridiculed for naming her two twin boys after iconic rock duo Oasis.
The woman took to popular forum Mumsnet to ask other parents their opinion about calling her sons Noel a… [+1258 chars]

articles.content:
